(Mantella, there were over 12 shots coming at Mantella and Drozom, not 2, 
please post proper damage, not to mention, Manterror through a charge that 
landed only a few feet behind Drozom and Mantella, which wuld've exploded on 
impact, not to mention about four of those 12 shots were energy-signature 
SEEKING missiles.)

Dark One/Pyro/Nemesis Enforcer/Double Punch/Injector/Manterror:

::Dark One was out of his CR chamber, stretching his neck, as was Pyro, to 
the right of him, when he recieved the com from Zardus about helping Nemesis 
Enforcer::
<Very well, Zardus, I will have Pyro accompany me>

"Yes, battle time!"
::Pyro transformed to his black dragon mode, heading for the entrance/exit of 
the base::

"You, are correct."
::Dark One transformed to his dilophasaurus (spitter) mode, his claws making 
scraping noises as they hit against the cold, metallic floor of Zardus' 
craft, the leader of the mercenary group heading after Pyro::

::Eventually, both were halfway caught up with Nemesis, who was almost to his 
destination::

==========

"Alright, DeathStorm, I'm detecting the energy signatures, they're just a 
mile or so ahead.  We'll stop here for a moment.  Check your weapons.  Don't 
fire them, but clean them if necessary, get more weapons from subspace if 
need be.  Slag, also reload them if necessary.  When done, let's head out!" 
::he ordered, taking out his rapid-firing laser rifle, taking out the energy 
pack in it and replacing it in a matter of moments::

==========

::Injector cringed as a laser blast scraped against the boulder he was 
behind, getting up as small pieces of rock had fell, he fired two stinger 
missiles off at the 'entrance/exit' of the Predacon base::

::Double Punch laughed as laser bolts nearly took of his head (missing 
though), firing off two energy-signature seeking missiles off at Mantella::

::Manterror yelped as a shot from Drozom dug into his already beaten on 
chest, falling backwards, nearly loosing his footing, firing off two ion 
disks, one at Drozom's left knee, one at Mantella's right knee::
